bibl.title: John Matthews v. Henry M. White. Telegram Confirmation
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington

body.p: CONFIRMATION OF TELEGRAM U.S. DEPARTMENT OF LABOR BUREAU OF IMMIGRATION WASHINGTON
United States of Attorney, Seattle, Washington.

Your telegram September nineteenth. stop. Kuminetz, Podolsk, locataed in Ukrania. stop. Verification Jack Matthews landing showing arrival victoria, B.C., shows he was twenty-seven years old at that time which now makes him twenty-nine born July 5, 1892. stop. Record hearing given him time of arrest which is in file you now have shows he was born in Czortkow English spelling Chortkof, town of Noshkofsky located Eastern Galicia. stop. Unable furnish certified copy treaty fixing present boundaries Eastern Galacia but am sending by mail document bearing on status.
HUSBAND
Attest, N.N. Husband Commissioner General
U.S. DEPARTMENT OF LABOR BUREAU OF IMMIGRATION WASHINGTON
United States Attorney, Seattle, Washington.
Sir:

Confirming your telegram of September 19, 1921, regarding the case of John Matthews, I wish to state that this alien has told so many falsehoods in his testimony at the time of arrest that it is almost impossible to asscertain what country he is really a subject of.

The countries of Ukrainia and Eastern Galacia (West Ukraunia) have not been recognized by the United States Government, and, of course, all matters pertaining to the procuring of passports for aliens who are ordered deported to these countries have to be taken up informally with the representatives thereof in Washington, D.C. In the present case it was first thought that the alien was from Ukrainia, but after the Ukrainian Representative reviewed the evidence submitted by the Bureau for a passport he himself referred the matter of the Eastern Galacian Representative, due to the fact that he thought that the alien was from Eastern Galacia, he (the alien) having stated in his hearing that he was born in the town of Czortkow (English spelling "Chortkof"), town of Noshkofsky which is located in Eastern Galacia.

Matthews landed at Victoria, B.C. August 31, 1919, verification of which landing is now in the file you now have. At the time of landing he stated he was twenty-seven years of age, which would now make him about twenty- nine years old. At the time he testified that he was born in Warsaw, Poland, which was evidently a fabrication. At any rate the Government of Poland will not give this man a passport and it is the Bureau's opinion that when he stated that he was born in the town above mentioned he told the truth inasmuch as he also stated that his father was born in this town.

The Bureau has been unable to secure a certified copy of the treaty fixing the present boundaries of Eastern Galicia, but is transmitting herewith a document which shows the statue of this country at the present time.
Respectfully, Husband Commissioner-General
CONFIRMATION OF TELEGRA U.S. DEPARTMENT OF LABOR BUREAU OF IMMIGRATION WASHINGTON
Immigration Services, Seattle, Wash.

Ukraine and Eastern Galicia two seperate countries with separate and distinct governments of their own. stop. Not recognized by the United States. Stop. Town of which Jack Matthews is native is now in Easten Galicia, and passport had to be secured from Eastern Galician representative before deportation could take place. stop. Warrant of deportation is hereby commanded directing deportation of alien to Eastern Galicia.
Attest: Assistant Secretary
Alfred Hampton Acting Commissioner General.
